pyHaasAPI
  • Installation
  • View page source

Installation

Requirements

  • Python 3.11 or higher

  • HaasOnline Bot Software (for API access)

Installation

Install pyHaasAPI using pip:

pip install pyHaasAPI

Or install from source:

git clone https://github.com/iamcos/pyHaasAPI.git
cd pyHaasAPI
pip install -e .

Dependencies

The following packages are automatically installed:

  • pydantic >= 2.0.0 - Data validation using Python type annotations

  • requests >= 2.31.0 - HTTP library for Python

  • loguru >= 0.7.0 - Python logging made simple

  • typing-extensions >= 4.7.0 - Backported and experimental type hints

Optional Dependencies

For development and testing:

pip install pyHaasAPI[test]

This installs:

  • pytest >= 8.0.0 - Testing framework

  • pytest-cov >= 4.1.0 - Coverage plugin

  • pytest-mock >= 3.14.0 - Mocking plugin

Verification

To verify the installation, run:

import pyHaasAPI
print("pyHaasAPI installed successfully!")

You should see no errors and the success message.

Upgrading

To upgrade to the latest version:

pip install --upgrade pyHaasAPI

Uninstalling

To uninstall pyHaasAPI:

pip uninstall pyHaasAPI
Previous Next
